entry.title: Sustainable Machine Learning
entry.content: In the era of ChatGPT and other AI models that allow you to get an answer to almost any question, letâ€™s take a step back and rethink our ML model choice before just doing an API call to yet another model.
entry.summary: intro to energy consumption of ML models

entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
First few steps after you make your al-folio website -

  • set up your personal info in _config.yml
  • update socials in socials.yml
  • clean up nav bar and decide which menu items to display
  • set up which github user and repos to show on repositories page
